content: विकल्पः {@--1@} Doubt, uncertainty, indecision, hesitation; तत्सिषेवे नियोगेन स विकल्पपराङ्मुखः <ls>R. 17. 49.</ls> {@--2@} Suspicion; <ls>Mu. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Contrivance, art; मायाविकल्परचितैः <ls>R. 13. 75.</ls> {@--4@} Option, alternative (in <ab>gram.</ab>). {@--5@} Sort, variety. {@--6@} An error, a mistake, ignorance. {@--7@} Distinction.
